name: The Third Prince of the Fallen Kingdom has Regressed
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: From the stuido that brought you Moon-Shadow Sword Emperor and The Legendary Hero is an Academy Honors Student.]Yuri, the unruly third prince of the fallen Briol Kingdom.After meeting his end while wandering in guilt, he ended up regressing to the spring of his 13th year, before the Empire&#039s invasion began!&quotBriols do not abandon honor, even in death.&quotOne harrowing regret is enough.The kingdom shall be saved from ruin!
